updates: New feature: Habitat Suitability Mapping (HSM). Mitigating positional errors from patrol data; Representative location selection from citizen data; Habitat mapping based on probability density functions.
New Feature: Data Sharing. Share&subscribe dataset/file with users/groups in EGC website.
New DTA webservices: slope, aspect, planform curvature, profile curvature.
Update demonstration videos in the homepage.
